extendedInfo.description: * A brand new twist on a classic Snake game! ** Extremely addictive gameplay for all ages and skill levels! ** Over 6 million users enjoy Doodle Grub on iPhone! Be a part of vibrant community too! *The iPhone HIT finally arrives on your Android device! We will be updating the Android version quite often with more features, stay tuned!* PRESS REVIEWS *- "Addictive game play, an easy to handle user interface and a price tag that simply screams âDownload me!!!!â make Doodle Grub Android app a blast." (4.5/5 AndroidAppsReview.com)- "Doodle Grub is up there with the best Android apps I have played and trust me â I have tried a lot." (5/5 TopAndroidApps.co.uk)- "You'll like it if you enjoyed classic Snake game and are waiting for a twist." (4/5 AndroidZoom)- "In my opinion, it's the first really interesting & well-done adaptation of the Snake game on Android" (Frandroid)* USER REVIEWS *- âSimply amazing, controls are smooth, game runs perfectly and fun graphics. Also themes are a great addition, you'll never get bored with the same thing over and over againâ - âThe best snake game for the iPhone!â - âWe really believe that Doodle Grub is a must-have mobile game. It is free, simple, addictive and beautifulâ.Tilt your device to navigate the grub eating apples as you go. Enjoy the food and grow in length. But be careful! Avoid collisions with nasty enemies moving around that will take the segments they touch. Once they hit the grub's head - the game is over! FEATURES:Intuitive and responsive tilt controlsOpen Feint enabled: track your achievements and check leaderboards, read news, compete against friendsTwitter and Facebook supportSame gameplay as on iOS devicesPlay with your friends, share your high scores, discover secret achievements and compete for the top spot on the leaderboards! Doodle Grub is a fun and addicting treat for kids and adults alike,Â the whole family will be addicted!* FOLLOW US * Twitter: http://twitter.com/DoodleGrub Facebook: http://facebook.com/DoodleGrubGame

reviews.title: Excellent game.
reviews.comment: I seldom rate games, but this game is really fun and easy to play with. Definitely worth the download. Simple to play.
reviews.author: Melvin Tan

reviews.title: I really enjoy this charming game
reviews.comment: This is an updated review. Doodle Grub is sweet, fun and charming. To access other backgrounds, tap your apple total in the upper right hand screen.  Customer service is prompt. My favorite game so far, and I\'ve been downloading tons of games since I got my phone 3 weeks ago.
reviews.author: River V.

reviews.title: Its an okay game
reviews.comment: Needs more to it like multiplayer why the hell doesn\'t vibrate work on the evo lte? it use to. if the feature is in the app i should be able to use it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game, esp with Sphero
reviews.comment: Good fun little game, my 4 year old loves it. It is best controlled with Sphero, but as another user noted there\'s a glitch where Sphero goes to sleep after a little while. Can\'t quite figure it out, but otherwise great game.
reviews.author: Donald Dew

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I absolutely love this game!:)
reviews.author: Anna Szwoch

reviews.title: Good fun with sphero
reviews.comment: Works well. Easy to play. Quick bit of fun with sphero
reviews.author: danny smith

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on HTC One S
reviews.comment: Downloaded the game and it wouldn\'t register movement on my phone.

reviews.title: Hilarious with drawbacks
reviews.comment: But gets tough and boring after awhile. To make matters worse open feint pops up on screen randomly prompting to connect to the net.
